The Science & Story Behind It

The success of ‘Peri-Pocket’ lies in its environmental resilience and flavor concentration.

  • The intense flavor concentration results from selective breeding for efficient mineral uptake from seawater and optimal conversion of algal diets into the signature briny-sweet taste compounds.
  • Their tolerance to artificial seawater conditions is achieved through selecting for individuals with robust osmoregulatory systems that handle the stable salinity of recirculating systems better than wild counterparts.
  • The compact size and rapid maturation are bred traits that allow for high-density culture while maintaining the authentic flavor profile of larger, wild periwinkles.

In short, City Periwinkle ‘Peri-Pocket’ is a flavor-intense, space-efficient, and remarkably hardy cultivar, bringing the authentic taste of the rocky shoreline to urban haloponic systems with reliable production and minimal space requirements.
